product.name: Galaxy Blue Sofa
product.description: Easy to love. The Sven in birch ivory looks cozy and refined, like a sweater that a fancy lady wears on a coastal vacation. This ivory loveseat has a tufted bench seat, loose back pillows and bolsters, solid walnut legs, and is ready to make your apartment the adult oasis you dream of. Nestle it with plants, an ottoman, an accent chair, or 8 dogs. Your call.
